author: feedback@businessinsider.com (Libertina Brandt), Libertina Brandt
title: 2 working parents from Michigan reveal the family schedule that allows them to work at least 4 to 6 hours a day from home during the coronavirus pandemic
description: Andy Hill Two parents from Michigan share how they're successfully managing parenting and working from home during the coronavirus pandemic. According to Andy Hill, a healthy and relaxed routine helps keep his kids positive and their days structured. Andy is …
content:
Andy and Nicole Hill live in Michigan with their two children, who are five and eight years old. 
The family lives in a 2,600-square-foot home in the Detroit metro area and has been, like many other families, hunkering down in the midst of the coronavirus pa… [+2322 chars]
